item.title: Setup Vim as a Flutter IDE using coc-nvim
item.description: I recently started using Neovim as my text editor.Also right now I am learning Flutter to create a mobile application for my personal project. So I decided to setup Neovim as a Flutter IDE.With this I can practice Vim with Flutter. Install Plugins To setup Neovim as Flutter IDE we need to use coc.nvim plugin .Also for formatting, I am using the dart_vim_plugin.We also need the snippets to be loaded like the ones for stateless/stateful widget.
